article_title: Column: Obama has more to worry about than bathrooms
article_text: The Lincoln Journal Star welcomes readers' comments. Letters to the editor must include the writer's name, address and home and work telephone numbers. We suggest you also include your e-mail address. The editors may edit and condense letters; the suggested length limit is 200 words.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , 2016 united states presidential election, barack obama, transgender issues
article_metadata.author: BY ANDREW MALCOLM

og.description: President Barack Obama’s communications strategists found a perfect tool to distract the public in recent days: Bathrooms. And who can use which ones.
